existing_features.title: Update the Admin Panel Production section form to capture separate work quantities for Double and Single, and separate rates for Double and Single (4 inputs total: quantityDouble, quantitySingle, rateDouble, rateSingle), matching the user-requested layout: quantities first, then rates below.

Update Admin Panel Production calculations and persisted history so totals are computed from the new fields: total = (quantityDouble * rateDouble) + (quantitySingle * rateSingle), and the stored history record includes these four fields plus computed totals.

Update the User Panel Production History view to show a list of all employees (workers) and display each workers Double and Single information derived from the Admin Production history data, instead of only filtering to the logged-in user.
Increase the font size of the four User Dashboard section tiles (Production, Snacks, Payment/Loan, Work) so the section titles are visibly larger and easier to read on mobile.

Fix User Panel typography and mobile layout so content fits within the phone viewport without being cut off at the bottom: reduce excessive spacing/padding in the User Dashboard layout while keeping readability, and ensure scroll + fixed footer behavior does not hide content.
